approved.name: Shaila Ahmed
approved.ingredients: 2 cups boiled chickpeas, 1 cup boiled potatoes (cubed), 1/2 cup tamarind pulp, 2 green chilies (chopped), 1/4 cup chopped cilantro, 1 tsp chaat masala, 1 tsp roasted cumin powder, Salt to taste, Crispy fried gram flour noodles for topping
approved.instructions:
1. In a large bowl, mix boiled chickpeas and cubed potatoes.
2. Add tamarind pulp, green chilies, and cilantro.
3. Season with chaat masala, cumin powder, and salt.
4. Mix well and let sit for 10 minutes to blend flavors.
5. Serve in small bowls topped with crispy noodles.
6. Garnish with extra cilantro and a squeeze of lime.
approved.notes: Adjust tamarind and chili to taste. Best served immediately while noodles are crispy.
